column4: Hey does anyone know the terminal command/sources.list syntax for repository keys?
the open source driver wont run any of the quake 4 /doom3 or ET games
you can run quake 4 on ubuntu!?
of course , i have been doing so for 4 years
!quake
Not with my card :'(
what card is that?
ATI Radeon X1900 XT
aah switch to ubuntu 8.04 and enjoy quake
Hrm.  I suppose I could make a partition and just do a fresh install of 8.04...do I have to get fglrx to use it?
yes !
thats why 8.04 is called long term support
put didn't ATI stop supporting the Catalyst driver?
ubuntu 8.04 comes with the older driver
its not supported on newer kernels thats all
i am going to do this now. Thank you so much!!
yes good, you might have some problems starting quake, but check the forums for that,
willl do
you will get the installer from link i gave you
hey, does it work for x86_64??
sure mine is too
works flawless on nvidia
yeah, yeah, i know. my card is old
